resources.string: An error has occurred, please verify user and password
The application does not have the required permissions to carry out this operation. Check the settings and try again
An error has occurred while performing the operation
The application seems to have no connection, please check network settings
The session has expired. Please log in again
The user does not have permission to use the application, please contact with an administrator
The application is not authorized to use web services, please contact an administrator.
The application does not have the required permissions to manage files. Check the settings and try again
There is a new version of the application, we recommend you to update before continuing
There is a new version of the application, you have to update it to be able to enter
Are you sure that you want to disconnect?
"The code doesn't look like a valid passport."
Put device closer to QR code
This employee is allowed free access to the facilities
"You can't access the center. Contact a health centre for an assessment"
"Indicates if the employee's temperature is lower or higher than 37ºC/98.6ºF"
The employee must renew the passport
"Enter worker's ID card and/or mobile phone to continue"
ID card with number and letter
Do you have any of the following symptoms?
Have you had a body temperature of over 37ºC/98.6ºF today?

Have you had any of the following symptoms related to COVID-19 today: Severe headache, persistent cough, breathing difficulties, sore throat, loss of taste or smell, severe headache, diarrhoea or skin rashes?

Have you had close contact with any person with a confirmed infection during the last 14 days?
(If you have a medical evaluation that has ruled out the risk associated with that close contact, you must answer `NO´)
The application will be restarted to implement the changes
